events.message: I was involved in a car collision yesterday evening at the intersection, and I am filing a claim for the damages to my vehicle.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial filing details and accident description.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle your car accident claim and will be in touch shortly.
We acknowledge the receipt of your auto accident claim and appreciate your cooperation in providing the necessary information.
Please submit the police report, photographs of the vehicle damage, and a copy of your driver's license within the next five days.
All requested documents including the police report and vehicle photos have been received and are under review.
Our claims investigation team has started examining all submitted materials to assess the details of this auto accident claim.
The investigation is complete, confirming the incident details and damages as reported in your auto accident claim.
A settlement amount covering the repair costs has been proposed, and you will receive a detailed offer shortly.
The customer has provided positive feedback regarding the quick response and fair settlement offer for their car accident claim.
Your auto accident claim has been approved, and we are proceeding with the next steps for payment issuance.
The approved settlement amount has been issued via bank transfer to your account as per the claim agreement.
The claim file is now officially closed following successful resolution and payment for your auto accident damages.
